thread.title: Amazon 3Q results up on strong sales, cloud computing growth - Inside Bay Area
thread.title_full: Amazon 3Q results up on strong sales, cloud computing growth - Inside Bay Area - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Inside Bay Area
title: Amazon 3Q results up on strong sales, cloud computing growth - Inside Bay Area
text:
The e-commerce powerhouse reported a surprise third-quarter profit, driven by a boost in revenue from its Prime Day promotion and continued strong growth in its cloud-computing offerings. Amazon's strategy has long been to invest the money it makes back into its businesses, particularly by expanding offerings in its $99-a-year Prime loyalty program and its cloud-computing business, called Amazon Web Services.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Inside Bay Area.
